review: Works great for my Crohn's with few minor side effects. As of 2016 Cigna/Express scripts will NOT cover as a preventative med.
Miracle drug for me after being on prednisone, flagyl, etc., for years.  Diagnosed in 1988 and living a very normal life after Imuran!
Did not help much with my Crohn's, but less side effects than others.
Did not work at all for my chronic Crohn's disease.
